title: Bloomberg Markets: Downes on YouTube Leading Media Revolution
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Downes on YouTube Leading Media Revolution
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Larry Downes Project Director Georgetown Center for Business and Public Policy Discussing accelerating disruption in the video industry with content like YouTube’s “Binging with Babish."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
